name: Harold
profile:
A wandering swordsman looking for his master.
He is one who has mastered the Magic Sword.

name: Therese
profile:
A veteran warrior who fought on many battlefields.
She becomes uncontrollable in battle when berserk.

name: Marsha
profile:
A hermit who avoids the populace by living in the
mountains. She seeks the true identity of the evil star.

name: Lucius
profile:
A man whose destiny was to become a saint. He
is full of passion and gives equal love to the enemy.

name: Justin
profile:
Stripped of his status. He wanders around protecting
others and stays true to his code of honour.

name: Amy
profile:
Her youth is bound by hatred. She acts like a 
wise-crack due to her life.

name: Victoria
profile:
A girl who's brought up by forest spirits. She loves
nature and protects the forest from disturbance.

name: Alan
profile:
A warlock who delivered fear to mankind. But through a
failed reincarnation, he has lost his memory.

name: Sirena
profile:
Her father is a master assassin. Throughout her
youth, she mastered the techniques of fighting.

name: Cainax
profile:
He is the current owner of Takeshi's blade. His
movements are fluid and sharp like a knife.
